meanings.definition: Used to express uncertainty or possibility.
meanings.sent1: She maybes will come to the party tonight.
meanings.sent2: I maybes need to buy some groceries later.
meanings.sent3: The weather forecast maybes predicts rain tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: His future success maybes depends on his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The teacher maybes explained the lesson clearly.

meanings.definition: A person who is undecided or unsure.
meanings.sent1: He is one of the maybes in our group project.
meanings.sent2: The maybes in the audience were still pondering their decision.
meanings.sent3: The maybes in the class couldn't make up their minds about the field trip.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a maybe in a sea of confident individuals.
meanings.sent5: The maybes were hesitant to commit to a definite answer.
